stories.text:
Hi everybody,

I'm the founder of Phenixio - a real-time Bitcoin payments platform. We've been developing it for the last couple of years, and I am happy to announce that it is finally ready for a test drive.

We've built our services on top of Lightning Network. It is the Layer-2 solution for Bitcoin that makes real-time payments possible. These Bitcoin payments are almost faster than credit card processing and only take about 1-2 seconds.

With Phenixio, you will access this payments network without going through any protocol-level complexity. You could start accepting payments from anyone with a BTC/LN wallet and from anywhere in the world.

It is still early days for us, and we are looking for pilot users who can provide some valuable feedback. Our API is quite simple, so you can easily integrate Bitcoin payments with your website. I should also mention that you don't need any Bitcoin knowledge to use it.

Let me know if you are interested. I will give you access to our testnet API.

API reference: https://testnet.phenixio.com/api/docs/ Website: https://phenixio.com
